snippet: Patti S. Hart, the board member who led the search for Yahoo’s chief executive, Scott Thompson, will not seek re-election, and the company says it will investigate how the erroneous credentials were overlooked.
abstract: Patti S. Hart, the board member who led the search for Yahoo’s chief executive, Scott Thompson, will not seek re-election, and the company says it will investigate how the erroneous credentials were overlooked.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and EVELYN M. RUSLI

headline.main: Yahoo Tries to Address Error on Chief's Degree
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Tries to Address Error on Chief’s College Degree
